name: Help Pump, the pumpkin, to get home
name_original: Help Pump, the pumpkin, to get home
description:
A game made for a jam with 3 hours.

 All control is based on the mouse.

It is about a pumpkin that can jump and bounce off walls, the goal is to get home and friends, but it must escape from thorns and reach the goal in less than 10 seconds.
